MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 area of Johnstone, affecting properties in Longmeadow and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:21PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:51pm on Monday, 05 April 2021
